to a recorded location instantly.

<voice 03050_00000267><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>Now, let's begin the rite of maturity.

268.<voice 03278_00000268><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 03278_00000268><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>O great god of wind, o nurturing Yggdrasil!<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>

269.<voice 03308_00000269><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 03308_00000269><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>Grant upon these three
the Mark of Adulthood.<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>

270.<voice 03570_00000270><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 03570_00000270><start_lip_sync n00213 _normal m00001>The Mark of Adulthood...<stop_lip_animation n00213 CLOSE_MOUTH>

271.<voice 03630_00000271><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 03630_00000271><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>With this, you'll be granted an audience
with the rulers of foreign lands.
Do not bring shame to that Mark!<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>

272.<voice 03770_00000272><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 03770_00000272><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>Now, go forth. You are the pride of
this village, our young leaves.<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>

273.<voice 03840_00000273><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 03840_00000273><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>May Yggdrasil guard your future!<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>

274.<voice 03960_00000274><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 03960_00000274><start_lip_sync n00213 _normal m00001>I'm going to become worthy of Ucharin!<stop_lip_animation n00213 CLOSE_MOUTH>

275.<voice 04020_00000275><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 04020_00000275><start_lip_sync n00213 _normal m00001>I'm setting off!
Adios!!<stop_lip_animation n00213 CLOSE_MOUTH>

276.<voice 04198_00000276><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 04198_00000276><start_lip_sync n00214 _normal m00001>I'm going, too. I have to figure out
what's going on in the world.<stop_lip_animation n00214 CLOSE_MOUTH>

277.<voice 04268_00000277><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 04268_00000277><start_lip_sync n00214 _normal m00001>And I need to learn the truth behind
what Lady Himea said earlier!<stop_lip_animation n00214 CLOSE_MOUTH>

278.<voice 04378_00000278><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 04378_00000278><start_lip_sync n00214 _normal m00001>You take care, too. Somewhere,
someday...I'll see you again!<stop_lip_animation n00214 CLOSE_MOUTH>

279.<voice 04685_00000279><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 04685_00000279><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>I finally understand, <pc>.<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>

280.<voice 04795_00000280><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 04795_00000280><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>How could <pc>, who supposedly
died after failing to revive an 
ancient spell, still be alive...?<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>

281.<voice 04945_00000281><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 04945_00000281><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>This is your true appearance, isn't it?<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>

282.<voice 04995_00000282><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 04995_00000282><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>Your soul was rescued and this
body was given to you so that you
can fulfill a great mission, right?<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>

284.<voice 05125_00000284><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 05125_00000284><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>You must now travel the world and
hone your skills. Use your 
power for the benefit of everyone.<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>

285.<voice 05195_00000285><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 05195_00000285><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>Collect the Key Emblems that are
awarded to heroes in each country.
If you do, a path shall surely open.<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001429.<voice 05776_19001429><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 05776_19001429><start_lip_sync n00246 _normal m00001>No matter how I look at you, you
look just like <pc>, but... you're
different on the inside, aren't you...?<stop_lip_animation n00246 CLOSE_MOUTH>

293.<voice 05805_00000293><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 05805_00000293><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>The owner of that body was dear to us...<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>

294.<voice 05842_00000294><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 05842_00000294><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>Please never forget that you are
the one who was supposed to lead 
and guide us.<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>

295.<voice 05995_00000295><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 05995_00000295><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>I pray that you will succeed in your quest.<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>

296.<voice 06146_00000296><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 06146_00000296><start_lip_sync n00244 _normal m00001>I've told the people in the Garden of

have completed their rite of maturity.<stop_lip_animation n00244 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000630.<voice 06177_19000630><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 06177_19000630><start_lip_sync n00244 _normal m00001>Come now, it's time to begin your
journey. First, head west to Azlan, the

298.<voice 06275_00000298><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 06275_00000298><start_lip_sync n00244 _normal m00001>Please, take care.<stop_lip_animation n00244 CLOSE_MOUTH>

300.<voice 00422_00000300><start_lip_sync m5: <voice 00422_00000300><start_lip_sync m50001 _normal m00001>See ya later～～!!<stop_lip_animation m50001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

9200.<voice 00083_00009200><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00083_00009200><start_lip_sync n00244 _normal m00001>It's been a while, hasn't it,
<pc>? Please come this way.<stop_lip_animation n00244 CLOSE_MOUTH>

9201.<voice 00491_00009201><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00491_00009201><start_lip_sync n00244 _normal m00001>Pardon the intrusion.

9203.<voice 00746_00009203><start_lip_sync n0:

9204.<voice 00805_00009204><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00805_00009204><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001><pc>. Do you remember what

 you your Mark of Adulthood?<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>

9205.<voice 00835_00009205><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00835_00009205><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>The owner of that body

9206.<voice 00895_00009206><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00895_00009206><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>You have successfully fulfilled the

9207.<voice 00925_00009207><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00925_00009207><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001>Because of you, the five continentsー
including our own continent of
Eltonaーhave been saved.<stop_lip_animation n00211 CLOSE_MOUTH>

9208.<voice 01005_00009208><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01005_00009208><start_lip_sync n00211 _normal m00001><pc>. Now you must broaden your horizons
